chart_description: The Disk Total I/O Time chart displays the total time it takes for a disk to perform input/output (I/O) operations in milliseconds per second. This can help to identify any performance issues with disk operations and determine if upgrades or adjustments are necessary.

dimension_descriptions.reads: The time it takes for the disk to complete read operations in milliseconds per second. A high read time may indicate that the disk is struggling to keep up with read requests.
dimension_descriptions.writes: The time it takes for the disk to complete write operations in milliseconds per second. A high write time may indicate that the disk is struggling to keep up with write requests.
